title: Mobile-Based Flexible Learning Strategies for Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic nursing concepts and administrative/management job experience
context.additional_context: Designed to enable working professionals to learn during work hours by leveraging blended learning and technology-based learning strategies in smartphone-centric, resource-constrained environments.

learning_goals: Learners can understand and explain core nursing concepts (e.g., infection control, patient assessment) with 80% accuracy using 10-minute microlearning content in mobile environments.
Learners participate in weekly live video discussions (2 sessions Ã— 30 minutes) to share and evaluate flexible learning strategies linked to real-world work scenarios with peers.
Learners submit and receive peer feedback on a field problem-solving project utilizing smartphone camera functions at the end of the one-week course.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
